application_details: Applicant received a positive selection decision on June 21, 2012, but medical and criminality checks were incomplete by June 29, 2012.
decision_reasoning: The judicial review is dismissed as the Applicant did not meet all requirements by March 29 or June 29, 2012.
procedure_followed: Judicial review via mandamus sought to reinstate terminated visa application; court analyzed legislative intent and procedural fairness.
result_of_case: Court dismissed the application, upholding the termination of the visa application under s 87.4.
